titles.title: To suspend temporarily the rate of duty on Rubberized textile fabrics of cotton, other than those of heading 5902.
To suspend temporarily the rate of duty on Rubberized textile fabrics of cotton, other than those of heading 5902.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on Rubberized textile fabrics of cotton, other than those of heading 5902.
